If someone offered up $1 million to charity and all you had to do was play golf, would you do it? You don’t even have to win, just play the game. I am sure you would, as $1 million to a charity would drastically change the game for most causes (unless it’s something like the Hilton Foundation). But Biden did more than say no to helping out a nonprofit in need, he did what the left does best, which is lie, deflect, and gaslight.

title: Here's Joe Biden's PATHETIC response to Trump accepting his golf challenge

Trump isn't the only one conspicuous by his silence. As the White House Press Corps has been getting increasingly chirpy at Karine Jean-Pierre, Doocy hasn't had much to say at press briefings. That ended on Tuesday with a poignant question. Say there is a nuclear attack and Joe Biden is sleeping. Who gets the phone call?

Doocy's silence was odd since he's usually the one that tends to ask the difficult questions, while the other journalimers do their best to carry water for Biden. They have been looking the other way and/or LYING on behalf of the Bi
title: Doocy hammers WH: In a nuclear strike, will the Pentagon call Joe Biden or his caregiver Jill Biden?

Post-debate, Donald Trump has been conspicuous by his silence as Democrats have disarraying out on these streets. So conspicuous, the Left and the media (but I repeat myself) have practically been begging him to say anything. title: Watch: Trump breaks his post-debate silence with TWO challenges Biden will be too chicken to take
